text: aṭiccamarttappeṭṭirunnavar ahanta naṭiccirunnavarēāṭu paṟayuṁ: "alla, rāppakalukaḷile niṅṅaḷuṭe kutantrattinṟe phalamāṇit. ñaṅṅaḷ allāhuve niṣēdhikkānuṁ avanu samanmāre saṅkalpikkānuṁ niṅṅaḷ kalpiccukeāṇṭirunna kāryaṁ ōrkkuka." avasānaṁ śikṣa kāṇumpēāḷ avar duḥkhaṁ uḷḷileāḷippikkuṁ. satyaniṣēdhikaḷuṭe kaḻuttil nāṁ kūccuvilaṅṅiṭuṁ. avar pravartticcukeāṇṭirunnatinṟe pratiphalamallē avarkkuṇṭāvū
